japanese: いやぁ、兄貴はスゴイぜ！/オイラもやりてぇなあ、/完全試合！
english: Well, my brother is amazing! /I wanna do it too, /a perfect game!

japanese: いや、/他の部が何をやるのか/調べてたんだ。
english: No, /I was checking what /other clubs are doing.

japanese: いや、それはダメだ。/これは俺自身の問題だ。/お前には関係ない。
english: No, that won't do. /This is my own problem. /Nothing to do with you.

japanese: う、うん……。/でも、気が向いたら来てね。/いつでも直すから。
english: Y-yeah... /But come by if you feel like it. /I'll fix it anytime.

japanese: いきなり何をいいだすの、ロイ？
english: What are you suddenly saying, Roy?

japanese: いや、見てないけど……/何かあったのか？/そんなに慌てて。
english: No, I didn't see... /Something happen? /You're so flustered.

japanese: いきなり決勝ね！/!0と!1の対戦よ！
